cont.entity_a: Lens has spots that appear in pictures over time. Lens quality significantly affects image clarity.
cont.entity_b: Lenses are interchangeable with most F-mount Nikons.

cont.entity_a: Flash issues were resolved with cleaning. Some issues with flash exposure in auto mode were resolved with a replacement.

Camera Body.comm: Camera body has a good feel.

cont.entity_a: Camera body and lens have the right weight and feel, not too fragile.
Battery lasts long, but a second battery was purchased. Battery life is impressive, but the battery compartment door is flimsy. Some issues with battery and port connection.
Produces great pictures despite being almost 10 years old. High quality photos and camera build.
cont.entity_b: Limited by lower megapixel count. Not suitable for large prints due to lower megapixels.

cont.entity_a: Latency is subsecond, capturing action shots well.
Does not take video.
Allowing more focus on creativity. Easy to use with intuitive system controls.
cont.entity_b: Great for beginners, with easy-to-use controls. Very user-friendly for beginners.

cont.entity_a: Low noise performance is above average at ISO1600.

Durability.comm: Durable and reliable over several years.

cont.entity_a: Dependable and durable, lasting through years of use.
Compatible with older Canon lenses. Not compatible with 64-bit operating systems. Lacks support for 64-bit operating systems.
cont.entity_b: Compatible only with 2GB or smaller SD cards.

cont.entity_a: Shutter speed and image capture are impressive.
Many accessories are available but expensive.
Solid build with a great grip. Heavy metal body.
Autofocus is fast and accurate.
8 megapixel resolution allows for large prints.
Rapid shooting feature is effective for action photography.
Controls are well-placed, but the power switch is awkwardly located.
cont.entity_b: ISO and White Balance have dedicated buttons.

cont.entity_a: Lacks true spot metering and has a loud mirror slap.
Advanced control algorithms.
File naming system can lead to overwriting pictures.
Very good camera for the price.

cont.entity_b: Lemon camera sold with broken aperture mechanism. Aperture mechanism issue after purchase.
Converted to an infrared-only camera, suitable for astrophotography.
